com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.edition
Class DeletionInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.edition.DeletionInfo

public class DeletionInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Information about a deletion action. It has information about the deleted pk and the index of the matching row in the source table

Author:
Fernando González Cortés
